Package snakes

Interface ISquare


  • public interface ISquare
    This Interface provides the Structure for a Square. The Square is what the Game consists of and where the Players can stand on whilst playing the game.

    The ISquare Interface provides Methods for moving the Player onto and away from a square.

    It also provides some Informations needed by both the Game and the Players. These Informations include its position, whether it is the first or the last square, whether it is occupied and if it is a Wormhole exit or not.

    The Interface is implemented by the Square class and mostly used by the Game, that consists of several Squares and the Player, that stands on Squares.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    07.03.2018
    Author:
    Nicolas MÃ¼ller 17-122-094, Cedric Aebi 17-103-235

    • Method Detail

      • position

        int position​()
        Returns:
        the Position this Square is standing on in the Game.

      • moveAndLand

        ISquare moveAndLand​(int moves)
        Calculates which square is the given amount of squares apart from this one (towards the end of the game).
        Parameters:
        moves - How much squares the player should move.
        Returns:
        the Square on which the Player should land on.

      • isFirstSquare

        boolean isFirstSquare​()
        Returns:
        true if it is the first square of the board false else

      • isLastSquare

        boolean isLastSquare​()
        Returns:
        true if it is the last square of the board false else

      • enter

        void enter​(snakes.Player player)
        Final Step of a Player to enter this square. It can only be called if this Square is already empty (because only one player can be on one square)
        Parameters:
        player - The Player which enters the square

      • finalEnter

        void finalEnter​(snakes.Player player)
        A Method used by the Wormhole and Swapsquare function of the Game. It is used for entering a special kind of square, finally.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player which enters the square

      • leave

        void leave​(snakes.Player player)
        Makes the square leave the specified player.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player which has to leave this square

      • isOccupied

        boolean isOccupied​()
        Returns:
        true if the square is occupied false else

      • landHereOrGoHome

        ISquare landHereOrGoHome​()
        Makes sure the Player that wants to enter this Square is sent back to the first square if this one already has a Player on it.
        Returns:
        Either this square (if it is empty) Else the first Square

      • isWormholeExit

        boolean isWormholeExit​()
        Returns:
        true whether it is a wormhole exit false else
